content: a sustainable and vibrantly colored toy or a great addition to a crochet fruit & vegetable center piece you ll receive a downloadable 7-page pdf pattern with detailed instructions and lots of clear pictures to help you along the way i am always available to help and answer questions as well the crochet pattern is written in us terms and will be available by download immediately after purchase the pattern includes the method for crocheting the apples in 2 different color ways solid red or green and combo colored with red and green similar to a honeycrisp apple the apple will end up being about 3 - a realistic size materials you will need - dk/light worsted weight yarn / 100% organic cotton - 3 mm crochet hook - stuffing - tapestry needle - scissors - stitch markers abbreviations used in the pattern chain chain st stitch hk hook slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet increase increase 2 single crochets in one stitch decrease decrease 2 stitches together x repeat instructions indicated number of times total number of stitches in round this pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced sold distributed or translated without authorization from off the beaten hook you can sell your finished items provided that you credit off the beaten hook as the designer but you may not use my photos for your listing thank you for your respectfulness thank you for supporting my small business when you support a small business you support a dream join the off the beaten hook community for lots of free patterns video tutorials and tons of downloadable crochet resources blog https //offthebeatenhook com/ instagram https //www instagram com/offthebeatenhook/ etsy https //www etsy com/shop/offthebeatenhook
